attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: clearly they have no competence in running a country. they have been given more money than any government in british history and have totally wasted it. all of our lives are being intruded on every day and freedom of speech is at an all time low. they will lose the next election but they will be free to fight another day, but they will never again have the opportunity they have had this time, and they didnt deliver. never again can they be trusted so i believe they have no place in british politics
